website_summaries.verdict: Two load binders are included in this package, making it a great deal on a popular and well-received product.
pros: A great value for the money
Effective in spite of smaller size
cons: These load binders are smaller than some other choices
Check to make sure the size would fit your needs before purchasing

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality product
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery & great price. Loop to loop range is 11-5 inches, the hooks connected to loops accomodate max 5/16" chain. I used a 5/16 connector links to adapt to my 3/8 chain. All movements are smoothe and device appears to be quality manufactured. Does the job and functions like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas C

customer_reviews.title: these things are tiny a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: dont buy. these things are tiny a complete waste of money. When you do want to try and return them they will require you to pay for shipping. just dont buy them unless your going to tie down a toy...
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: These work great as expected. Easy on and easy off and fast. They are much easier to use than the small ratchets on straps and the other tools to tighten chains for heavy loads.
customer_reviews.author: Oso

customer_reviews.title: small but very strong.
customer_reviews.text: works great for binding small chain in those tight spots, will buy more at later time . great little units.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They work well and hold down my 3000 lb tractor on my trailer. Easy to ratchet on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jpabshire

customer_reviews.title: good quality but they work so well they GROW LEGS, check friends before they leave after borrowing them!
customer_reviews.text: worked great arrived fast no issues better buy 2 sets (See above)
customer_reviews.author: L&L

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: These are very difficult to use and I could not get load tight enough so I went back to the old style.
customer_reviews.author: hefe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product. Exactly what I was looking for and every happy with the price and quality not like the cheap ones I had found before.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: First time using ratchet binders to haul a tractor and implements at 7 K + lbs. So much easier than the snap binders and made it easier to get just the right tension on the chains. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: SisQScott

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised of the quality and durability. I would recommend it to everyone. Dclawnservicesinc7.com
customer_reviews.author: lanis d capshaw

customer_reviews.title: solid and strong
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for keeping the pallet forks tight and straight on my bucket. These are well made and just as there larger units.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Picture matching item that you are buying.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as picture, be careful when ordering. I needed rachet binders , not chin Buster's.
customer_reviews.author: Ray F.

customer_reviews.title: good so far
customer_reviews.text: was bought for my husband....he says they are working great....uses them to tie down his tractors when hauling them
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: A solid product at a good price. These binders work (ratchet) properly
customer_reviews.text: A solid product at a good price. These binders work (ratchet) properly, so I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: good buy works as well as some more expensive ones i have
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Good binders
customer_reviews.text: These were actually sturdier than I expected, and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bruha

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These binders are well made and exactly what I need to haul smaller loads such as ATVs etc. They are a safer and more secure method of tie downs than the ratchet straps most people use. I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Bought these to secure my jeep ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Bought these to secure my jeep on flat bed trailer. Engagement is tight and the finish seems to be holding up
customer_reviews.author: DHPOSER

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Binder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Vastly superior than what I expected. Easy to operate and strong. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BKBLMN

customer_reviews.title: Small Load Binders for Tight Spaces
customer_reviews.text: These are small units and just what I needed for my application with limited space. They work and are well made.
customer_reviews.author: J.G. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty boomer. More than I need but better to have more than not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Thirty

customer_reviews.title: Much needed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous using these the first time, but they are a great addition when I’m not securing the titanic. Easy and small is a plus, oh and no busted knuckles with the old binders.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. Paint job is just so so. I wished amazon would force it sellers to clearly state country of origin in the item description.
customer_reviews.author: David427

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. One of them literally broke the very first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the money. I’ve only used them a few times but have had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Smokovich

customer_reviews.title: good chain load binders and the price is right.
customer_reviews.text: Great! These work perfectly and appear to be identical to the ones at my local equipment stores for about half the price!
customer_reviews.author: VT MCG

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: they look good haven't a had chance use them yet .

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a good price. Timely delivery. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and quality seems to be decent quality

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, a low price with acceptable quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great Binders
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Great price and very good service Thanks Robert

customer_reviews.title: and the best price on the internet
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, well made, and the best price on the internet. Oh yes, and the customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: mike

product_meta.title: 2 Pack Truck Trailer Load Binder Ratchet Chain Binder for 1/4" to 5/16" Chain (Working Load Limit: 2,600 LBS)
product_meta.description: Material Type:Ratchet Chain Binder| Size Name:1/4"-5/16" : 2,600 LBSTwo Pack of Ratchet Style Load Binders.Size: Small
feature_bullets: 2-HEAVY DUTY - This 2-pack of Ratchet Style Load Binders has a forged steel handle that offers maximum leverage and has a working load limit of 2,600 lbs. Use it to tighten tie down chains in no time.

EASY TO USE AND SAFE - Since our extremely durable ratchet load binders meet FMCSA and DOT specifications, there is no need to worry when using this binder. Also, all of the binders are conveniently stamped with the size, break strength, and working limit on the handle.
COMPATIBLE - These load binders are designed to work with a 1/4" to 5/16" chain, making it one one of the most flexible and compatible ratchet load binders on the market.
DIMENSIONS - The length of this ultra strong ratchet load binder 12 inches hook to hook when closed. The total ratchet handle length is 7.5 inches.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
